zh.title: 苏联太空船礼炮7号与联盟T-9对接失败
英国与中国就香港问题草签联合声明
加拿大短跑运动员本·约翰逊打破百米世界纪录，后被查出服用兴奋剂
美国在线推出图形化网络浏览器
塔利班攻占阿富汗首都喀布尔
联合国千年发展目标正式确立
印度教寺庙遭恐怖袭击，造成多人伤亡
瑞士信贷银行被政府紧急注资
委内瑞拉举行议会选举
香港发生大规模“占中”运动

en.title: Boeing 767, wide-body airliner, made its first flight.
Oktoberfest bombing in Munich kills 13, injures over 200.
United Kingdom agrees to return Hong Kong to China in 1997.
Ben Johnson stripped of Olympic gold medal for doping.
The Carabinieri Headquarter bombing in Palermo kills one and injures nine.
Newcastle Brown Ale ceases production in Newcastle.
Anti-globalization protests disrupt World Bank/IMF meetings in Prague.
East Timor becomes a member of the United Nations.
Typhoon Ketsana hits the Philippines, causing widespread flooding.
43 students abducted in Iguala, Mexico, sparking national outrage.
